item.title: As Trump berates Goldman, other economists agree that higher tariff inflation is coming - CNBC
item.description:
1. As Trump berates Goldman, other economists agree that higher tariff inflation is coming  CNBC
  2. Layoffs? Price Increases? Companies Make Hard Choices as Trump’s Tariffs Set In.  The New York Times
  3. Trump said foreign countries would 'eat' tariffs—but U.S. consumers and businesses will actually pay 75% at best  Fortune
  4. Goldman Sachs doubles down on tariff research that infuriated Trump, saying average Americans will bear two-thirds of the costs  Fortune
  5. Household budgets could feel a tighter squeeze with new round of tariffs  WWBT
